items.name: ARTICHOKE SPINACH DIP
items.description: A creamy, flavorful dip featuring artichoke hearts and spinach, a delightful appetizer.

items.name: CHEESY PULL-APART BREAD
items.description: A warm, cheesy pull-apart bread, perfect for sharing, with a soft and gooey interior.

items.name: HOT CORN AND CHEESE DIP
items.description: A savory corn and cheese dip, brimming with flavor and perfect for a starter.

items.name: LOADED BAKED POTATO DIP
items.description: A rich, loaded baked potato dip with a blend of creamy flavors and toppings.

items.name: SUN-DRIED TOMATO DIP
items.description: A flavorful sun-dried tomato dip, offering a tangy and subtly sweet taste experience.

items.description: Spicy noodles, with a tantalizing blend of spices and flavors.

items.name: NOODLES SEAFOOD
items.description: Noodles with a delightful combination of seafood flavors and textures.

items.name: NOODLES BARBEQUE
items.description: Noodles with a savory and sweet barbecue sauce, a satisfying dish.

items.name: NOODLES BEEF
items.description: Noodles featuring tender beef, perfectly cooked and seasoned.

items.name: NOODLES CHICKEN
items.description: Noodles cooked with tender chicken, a delectable and satisfying meal.

items.name: CARDAMOM MAPLE SALMON
items.description: A flavorful salmon dish, featuring a combination of cardamom and maple syrup.

items.name: BURMESE CHICKEN CURRY
items.description: A flavorful Burmese chicken curry, featuring unique spices and flavors.

items.name: FRIED CHICKEN SANDWICH
items.description: A crispy fried chicken sandwich, a classic comfort food option.

items.name: SICILIAN ROASTED CHICKEN
items.description: A succulent roasted chicken, seasoned with Sicilian flavors, a delightful dish.

items.name: DELICIOUS TURKEY BURGERS
items.description: Delicious turkey burgers, perfect for a satisfying and filling meal.
